extensionDescription.message:
Organize frequently visited sites in a convenient menu of visual bookmarks
instead of a blank browser page. Bookmarks can be divided into folders, and
folders - into other folders. You can quickly open a bookmark or folder from
any other tab using keyboard shortcuts. Each folder can be stylized. If you
don't want to draw attention to a bookmark, it is not necessary to hide it
somewhere far away, but you can only hide its preview and/or title and
arrange it as it conveniently does. The structure of the bookmarks can be
easily synchronized between different devices or saved to disk.

Why does this extension needed various permissions?
- Store unlimited amount of client-side data:
    - storing of information about bookmarks and folders;
    - storing of settings;
- Access browsing history:
    - compiling a list of proposals during the creation of the bookmark;
- Access browser tabs:
    - opening bookmarks in existing or new tabs;
    - processing keyboard shortcuts for navigating bookmarks from the keyboard;
- Access data on other sites (optional):
    - retrieve information about pages while creating bookmarks (page title,
      icon, screenshot-preview);
    - placement on the pages of interface elements for navigation from the
      keyboard;
- Hide and show browser tabs:
    - request pages info (title, icon, preview screenshot) without displaying a
      new tab on the tabs panel when creating or updating bookmarks.

elemsWillBeLost.message: Content of cells with number bigger than $1 will be irretrievably lost ($2 bookmark$3, $4 folder$5)

errMsg.message: Operation was interrupted due to error

rlyDeleteElement.message: Do you really want to delete element â„–$1 ($2)

elementIsNotFound.message: There is nothing at this address

rootFolderSettingsDesc.message: Parameters of main folder, that just displayed on a new empty tab.

newTabFocusSettings.message: Focus capturing on a new tab

newTabFocusSettingsDesc.message:
This parameter defines where must be focus when a new empty tab is open.
If focus is on the page, you can immediately use the keyboard navigation (Ctrl + bookmark/folder address).
If focus is on the address bar, you can immediately enter addres of some page. To use keyboard navigation you are to click anywhere on the page before.

rlyRestoreRootFolderForm.message: Do you really want to restore root folder settings form? Fields will be filled with current values.

structureManagingDesc.message: Here you can store bookmark structure into remote storage (available if you logged in to a Firefox Account) or onto disk, or restore what you've stored before. In case of something goes wrong, there is Reset function.

rlyOverwriteCurrStructure.message: Do you really want to overwrite current bookmarks structure?

rlyOverwriteRemoteStructure.message: Do you really want to overwrite bookmarks structure in remote storage?

noStructureInSync.message: No bookmarks structure found in remote storage

historyPermission.message: Access browsing history - when you will enter bookmark's URL, there will be suggested variants from browsing history

tabHidePermission.message: Hide and show browser tabs - when you're creating or updating bookmarks, request pages info (title, icon, preview screenshot) will be carried out without displaying a new tab on the tabs panel
